## DropdownMenuPropsInternallyControlled type

Props for the `DropdownMenu` component when the open state is controlled internally by the component. In this case, the `isOpen` and `onRequestOpenChange` props should not be provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DropdownMenuPropsInternallyControlled = DropdownMenuPropsBase & {
    isOpen?: never;
    onRequestOpenChange?: never;
};
```
**References:** [DropdownMenuPropsBase](./dropdown-menu.dropdownmenupropsbase.md)
